text: Anthony James Arnaud Watson (1910-1970) was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He competed for England in the shot put at the 1934 British Empire Games in London. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1970 deaths Category:English male shot putters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1934 British Empire Games
title: Anthony Watson (athlete born 1909)
